case.state: When you think 'strip poker' you'd expect something kinda sleazy, so a place like this is a nice surprise.
I can see a place like this being real popular with some of the girls back at the base.

It's the beach~!
The ocean has a real different feel when you're here for fun and not for work.
It's kinda windy up here, huh? Oh, but the view is pretty nice!
Now this is my kinda atmosphere! I look like I fit right in, don't I?
Aw, this would've been the perfect time to show off my new bikini...
Like, what's even going on in this room? This place's a lot more 'creepy' than 'sexy'.
O~oh, nice, a hot spring! D'ya think this one's got mineral water in it? I heard that stuff is incredible for your skin.
Woah, this place is huge! But, does it feel kinda empty to anybody else?
O~oh, wow, this place is seriously amazing! Do you live here, ~player~?
Umm... we're not going to start playing here, right? Don'tcha think this is a little bit much...?
Cute room! Uh, I don't need to take off my shoes, right?
Getting naked in a locker room? I do plenty of that at work. I was hoping for a little bit of escapism, y'know?
Hmm... an office, huh...? I wonder if I could pull off that classic office lady look or not...
I know you're all gonna be drooling over me when the clothes start coming off, but keep it down 'kay?
Eugh, no-one told me that this place was gonna be all, like, gross and stuff.
Mmm? This wallpaper? "Romantic"? Uhh... sure... (More like tacky to me though.)
Hmm... this place feels kinda nostalgic, but I can't figure out why...
Y'know, I was expecting something a little more sexy when I heard about some strip poker joint. Not... like, an antique store or whatever.
Wow, this place is like, way too romantic for something as sleazy as a strip poker game. Whoever set this up's got some real good taste though!
Y'know, this place looks weirdly similar to the halls around the anchorage. Which is kinda weird, since it's a military base and all...
Well, it's not the worst alley I've had to str- uh, never mind.
Geez, what's with this creepy atmosphere? This is, like, totally not what I had in mind for this place!
Oooh, a bathhouse! Too bad the one back at base is like a hundred times fancier though.
Showers? Now? We haven't even gotten down and dirty yet!
Oh, hey, a camera? Make sure to get my cute side, 'kay? Jokes, I look cute from all angles.
Oh, an arcade! Hey, we should totally go do a purikura after this, yeah?
Wait a sec, when they said a 'strip poker place' I didn't expect to be playing at a club. Can't we do this somewhere a little more, like... intimate?
Ya~ho! Suzuya's here!
Heya! The name's Suzuya!
Suzuya, of the Mogami-class heavy cruisers, is here!
I've seen some crazy stuff, and I guess I'm adding 'teleporting magical girls' to that list.
Oh, hey, I know you! You're, uh... it's uh... oh, it's right on the tip of my tongue...
W-what's with this slimy tentacley person!?
Phew, at least Suzuya's got one gal-pal to keep me company.
Uh... it wasn't up to me to invite another girl to this, right? Because I sure didn't...
All these guys, just for me? Don't mind if I do...
Woah, gettin' real lively in here!
This has gotta be everyone, yeah?
Oh, yeah, Zekamashi, right? Heya~
S-sorry, Zoe. That was 'cuz of my... uh... occupational disease...?
Old maid's the more popular game back at the base, but I've played a bit of poker before.
Oh, 's it time to start? Here I go!
I'll be in all of your care today, 'kay?
It's nice to meet'cha all! Let's get this started, yeah?
Mmm...
(Hey, you'll deal Suzuya a good hand, right?)
Don't let me down, alright, dealer?
Oh, yeah, just take whatever, 'kay? Just gotta fix my nails...
This hand could be better if we get rid of...
Oooh, nice! Suzuya's keepin' these!
Nu-uh, I don't need any cards swapped this time.
Oho, this one's totally a keeper.
Yep, Suzuya's goin' with just this one.
Here, dealer, take this and pass me a new card.
I'm super close to something good, so... you know what to do, dealer.
Just one card away from a real good hand! Save me, dealer!
Hmm, this card doesn't really fit...
I guess this one's the odd one out.
I'll keep these four and get rid of... this!
This time, Suzuya's going for an all-or-nothing play!
De~aler, new hand please! Make it a good one too, okay?
Take 'em all! Yep, Suzuya wants a new hand!
"Go big or go home", right? Here. We. Go!
Let's just go with a whole new hand.
How about... uh... these, I guess...?
A~lright, Suzuya's picking... these ~cards.text~!
Suzuya's going with... these! Ah, wait, not that one though!
Okay, I've decided on these ~cards.text~ for sure!

C'mon, give Suzuya something good!
Take these ~cards.text~. Yeah, of course Suzuya's sure!

Huh, wait, this hand is pretty good..? Is Suzuya, like, some kind of genius or something?
No way, that was totally the exact card I needed!

Hope nobody was looking forward to seeing more of Suzuya, 'cause this hand looks super strong!
If you wanted to see more of Suzuya's sexy body, then you'll just have to wait another round.
D'ya like what'cha see? 'Cause you're not gonna see any more this round.
Ah, geez. It's so hot... I'm gonna be stuck in this outfit for another round, aren't I...
Hey, come on... I wanna get some of this off already... I feel like I'm gonna melt...

Hehe. Who's got below average luck now, huh?
A good hand to go with my good looks, lol.
Ooh, what a nice hand. Oh, and the cards are good too, haha.
Wait, is this kinda hand "all" or "nothing"? Hu~uh?
Umm... like, I was expecting a good or a bad hand, and this is... neither of those?
It's not what I wanted, but I'm totally taking it anyway.
Oh, uh, this card still makes Suzuya's hand better, right?
Wait, does this... oh, this card still works just fine! Nice!
Y'know, the longer you take to think, ~player~, the longer it'll be before someone gets naked.
Oh, hey, I wanna ask-- recently, I got asked about date spots by some of the girls. Anyone have some interesting recommendations?
I've been super into blood type personality theory lately. Suzuya's, like, totes an A, don'tcha think? I wanna hear everyone else's types too!
My purse has been, like, totally empty recently, but there's still so~o much I wanna buy. How's it for everyone else? Anything you really wanna get right now?
Everybody's got something they wanna be praised for, right? So I wanna hear-- what's something you're all not getting enough attention about?
Recently I was thinkin' maybe it's time for an image change, but there are just so~o many options that'll look good on me. What'cha all think? What kind of look d'ya think'd look best on me?

I was reading a section on horoscopes recently in a magazine and I was like, "woah, this is totally me!"
Like, that stuff has to be legit, right?
Ugh... I'm seriously gonna be all hot and sweaty... and not even for a fun reason...
Man, is it me or is it like super cold in here?
I'm so glad I kept my stockings on... I'd seriously be a Suzu-cicle by now if I didn't.

Hey, ~player~! Hurry up already! It's, like, so cold... I just wanna put my clothes back on already!
I wanna go and get my nails done after this, but, like, they always break during sorties. It just feels like such a waste...
Ahh... It's nice to be off duty once in a while. The admiral seriously works us girls to the bone, y'know?
Y'know, this is pretty fun! I should bring my sister around for one of these. Kumano'd be all like, embarrassed and stuff. It'd be hilarious!
Poker's not really all that popular around the base. Ah, maybe with the American girls though...?
Y'know, it's pretty hard to tell if these are winning hands or not sometimes.
Yep, this one's totally a winning hand... probably?
(As long as I look confident, it'll seem like I have a good hand, right?)
This is definitely the kinda hand that keeps things interesting!
Hey, ~player~, stop spending so long staring at Suzuya and figure out your hand already!
(Isn't ~player~ embarassed? I've caught ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ staring at me so~o many times this game already!)
There's no way I'd be embarassed by being half-naked. You should see what I look like after a rough sortie!
This is... definitely closer to "nothing" than to "all".

Ahaha... looks like Suzuya ended up one card short.
Aww, that wasn't the card I was looking for at all. Ehe~

(Mmm... maybe I should take off...)
Hmm... these don't match... and these don't match either...
This hand, like, really sucks. Like... really.
Ugh, lame.
Alright, Suzuya's about to do something real amazing!
So this is the hand I got? Bummer...
It'd be real nice to be a bit luckier right now.
Ma~an... poker's just not my kinda thing...
O~oh, this hand's... junk! LOL!
Hehe, this one's a winner for sure. You'll believe me, right, ~player~?
Phew! If I was playing for money, I'd be pretty upset right now.
Usually we go for the King's Game at mixers, but I'm sure strip poker will be just as fun.
So, a fun little game with just us gals? I'm totally down for that.
Y'know, I thinks I'm starting to get the hang of this game! Don't be surprised if Suzuya stops losing now, hehe.
Just kidding! Hahaha, trust me, we have much bigger things to worry about than pirates right now.
Wait, hold on. Dunban, what exactly did you say about navies?
(That was totally an accident, right, Komi-san? Don't worry, Suzuya'll cover for ya!)

Yep, Suzuya's decided! Caglicchi is still cute, even when she's all foul-mouthed like this!
Mmm, tomorrow's a weekend, so... oh, practice exercises! That's, like, as chill as it gets!

~blank~
